resources.string:
Wen-Pinn Fang received his BS degree in mechanical engineering in 1994 from National Sun-Yet-Sen University and his MS degree in mechanical engineering in 1998 from National Chiao Tung University, where he get his PhD degree in Computer Science in 2006 from National Chiao Tung University. His recent research interests include mobile device programming, image sharing, pattern recognition,, image processing and e-learning.
 
HomePage: http://140.138.146.85
